alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lebanon; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SCHUYLKILL...EAST CENTRAL DAUPHIN AND NORTHWESTERN LEBANON COUNTIES THROUGH 900 AM EDT... At 815 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Annville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Grove, Tremont, Fredericksburg, Tower City, Donaldson, Harper Tavern, Lickdale, Fort Indiantown Gap, Jonestown, Ravine, Muir, Orwin and Ono. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
